did.unittitle: Cora Wilson Stewart, seated and posing with a woman and two men. The back of the photograph reads: Visit to Lafayette of Mrs. Cora Wilson Stewart, 'The Lady of the Moonlight Schools' encouraging the education of adult illiterates. Left to right: Dr. M. S. Robertson, State Department of Education; Mrs. Stewart, Mrs. Stephens, Parish Superintendent J.W. Faulk. -Compliments of President Stephens, For Mrs. Stewart May 1929
